document.full_text: the marvel universe moves into the cosmic realm with "thor," a burly slab of bombastic superhero entertainment that skitters just this side of kitschy to provide an introduction befitting the mighty god of thunder.
document.title: "thor" gets summer off to thunderous start
lines_and_colors: the marvel universe moves into the cosmic realm with "thor," a burly slab of bombastic superhero entertainment that skitters just this side of kitschy to provide an introduction befitting the mighty god of thunder.
